layout.title: Onboarding
layout.subtitle: Complete setup to activate your workspace.

resumeLinkSent.title: Check your email
resumeLinkSent.description: We sent a secure resume link to continue onboarding.
resumeLinkSent.hint: Use the same email and open the latest message to continue.

reason.pendingVerification: Your account still needs email verification before activation.

feedback.resent: A new email has been sent. Check your inbox and spam folder.

errors.title: Unable to continue
errors.missingContext: We could not find your onboarding context. Start again from landing.
errors.loadFailed: We could not load your resume details. Try again or restart.

actions.continueHint: Open token verification and continue onboarding
actions.continueBlocked: Continue is unavailable while another action is in progress.
actions.resendHint: Send another resume link to your email
actions.restartHint: Go back to landing and start a fresh onboarding flow

resume.title: Resume onboarding
resume.description: Enter your email and verification token to continue.

feedback.resent: A new verification email has been sent.

actions.verifyHint: Verify email token and continue onboarding
actions.verifyDisabled: Verification is currently unavailable while another action is running.
actions.backHint: Return to the email sent confirmation step

provisioning.title: Provisioning workspace
provisioning.description: Preparing {{facility}} with starter setup and sample data.
provisioning.complete: Provisioning complete. Your workspace is ready.

errors.title: Provisioning unavailable
errors.missingContext: Provisioning context is missing. Restart onboarding.
errors.loadFailed: We could not load provisioning context. Try again.

actions.continueHint: Continue to the welcome summary after provisioning
actions.restartHint: Return to landing and start setup again

welcome.title: Activation summary
welcome.description: Review your setup details before first-run tasks.

errors.title: Unable to load summary
errors.missingContext: Activation summary is missing required onboarding details.
errors.loadFailed: We could not load activation summary. Try again.

actions.continueHint: Open first-run checklist and continue onboarding
actions.restartHint: Return to landing and restart onboarding

checklist.title: First-run checklist
checklist.description: Complete key starter tasks for your facility type.
checklist.readOnlyNote: Checklist progress is local guidance and does not change backend records.

register_patient.title: Register first patient
register_patient.description: Capture essential patient details to begin care operations.

book_appointment.title: Book first appointment
book_appointment.description: Create your first appointment and confirm scheduling flow.

create_invoice.title: Create first invoice
create_invoice.description: Generate a bill and verify billing setup works end-to-end.

record_consultation.title: Record first consultation
record_consultation.description: Document a consultation note to validate clinical workflows.

add_branch.title: Add branch
add_branch.description: Create at least one branch to model multi-site operations.

invite_staff.title: Invite staff
invite_staff.description: Add core team members and assign roles.

admit_patient.title: Admit patient
admit_patient.description: Run one inpatient admission to test hospital flow.

generate_bill.title: Generate bill
generate_bill.description: Create a bill for inpatient or outpatient services.

add_test.title: Add lab test
add_test.description: Create your first test entry in diagnostics.

receive_sample.title: Receive sample
receive_sample.description: Record incoming sample details and processing status.

enter_result.title: Enter result
enter_result.description: Capture a test result to validate reporting flow.

add_drug.title: Add drug
add_drug.description: Create your first pharmacy inventory item.

sell_item.title: Sell item
sell_item.description: Process one sale to test POS and billing.

view_stock_report.title: View stock report
view_stock_report.description: Check stock visibility and low-stock monitoring.

add_ambulance.title: Add ambulance
add_ambulance.description: Register an ambulance unit in the system.

receive_request.title: Receive request
receive_request.description: Capture an incoming emergency dispatch request.

dispatch_unit.title: Dispatch unit
dispatch_unit.description: Dispatch a unit to verify emergency workflow.

errors.title: Unable to load checklist
errors.loadFailed: We could not load checklist data. Try again.

actions.toggleHint: Toggle checklist completion for this item
actions.continueHint: Save checklist progress and open modules step

modules.title: Module recommendations
modules.description: Pick modules that match your workflows. You can update this later.
modules.readOnly: You are viewing recommendations in read-only mode until you sign in.
modules.subscriptionLinked: A subscription is linked. You can save module activation now.
modules.subscriptionMissing: No subscription is linked yet. Continue to plan setup first.

0.title: Core billing and appointments
0.description: Starter tools for scheduling, registration, and invoicing.

1.title: Clinical operations
1.description: Clinical workflows for encounters, notes, and follow-up.

2.title: Inventory and reporting
2.description: Stock visibility and operational reporting for growth.

errors.title: Unable to update modules
errors.authRequired: Sign in to save module subscriptions.
errors.subscriptionRequired: A subscription is required before module activation.

actions.saveBlockedAuth: Sign in to save module choices.
actions.saveBlockedPlan: Select a plan before saving modules.
actions.loginHint: Open login to save module choices
actions.continueHint: Proceed to trial status and limits

trial.title: Trial status
trial.description: Review current trial status and limit window.
trial.readOnly: Sign in to load live subscription trial status.

empty.title: No trial data found
empty.description: No active trial details were returned for this account.

actions.loginHint: Authenticate to load subscription trial details

upgrade.title: Upgrade value
upgrade.description: See what you unlock when moving beyond trial limits.
upgrade.daysLeft: {{count}} days remaining in your trial window.
upgrade.paywallNotice: Existing data stays accessible. Upgrade unlocks new actions only.

automation.title: Automate daily work
automation.description: Reduce manual steps across registration, billing, and operations.

fasterBilling.title: Faster billing collections
fasterBilling.description: Improve collection speed with clearer invoicing and payment flow.

expandedCare.title: Expand care modules safely
expandedCare.description: Enable additional modules as your facility needs grow.

retentionInsights.title: Operational insight visibility
retentionInsights.description: Track outcomes and usage trends for better decisions.

errors.title: Unable to load upgrade context
errors.loadFailed: Upgrade context could not be loaded. Return to trial and retry.

plan.title: Choose your plan
plan.description: Select a subscription plan and optional modules.
plan.readOnly: Sign in to create or update a subscription.
plan.moduleFallbackDescription: No description available for this module.

feedback.saved: Plan selection saved. Continue to billing cycle.

errors.title: Unable to save plan selection
errors.authRequired: Sign in to continue with plan selection.
errors.tenantRequired: Tenant context is required before creating a subscription.

actions.toggleModuleHint: Toggle module selection for this subscription
actions.continueHint: Save plan and continue to billing cycle selection

empty.title: No plans available
empty.description: No subscription plans were returned. Retry later or contact support.

billingCycle.title: Select billing cycle
billingCycle.description: Choose how often your plan will be billed.
billingCycle.readOnly: Sign in to apply billing cycle changes.

errors.title: Unable to update billing cycle
errors.authRequired: Sign in to continue with billing cycle setup.
errors.cycleRequired: Choose a billing cycle to continue.

actions.continueHint: Save billing cycle and proceed to payment

payment.title: Payment checkout
payment.description: Choose a payment method and complete activation.

credit_card.title: Credit card
credit_card.description: Pay instantly with major credit cards.

mobile_money.title: Mobile money
mobile_money.description: Pay using your mobile wallet provider.

bank_transfer.title: Bank transfer
bank_transfer.description: Pay by direct transfer from your bank account.

errors.title: Unable to process payment
errors.authRequired: Sign in before creating payment records.
errors.subscriptionRequired: Subscription context is required to continue.
errors.tenantRequired: Tenant context is required to continue.
errors.amountInvalid: Payment amount must be greater than zero.

actions.payHint: Create invoice, payment, and activate subscription
actions.payBlockedAuth: Sign in to pay and activate your subscription.

paymentSuccess.title: Activation status
paymentSuccess.descriptionActivated: Payment and subscription activation are confirmed.
paymentSuccess.descriptionPending: Activation is still syncing. Retry to refresh status.

errors.title: Unable to verify activation
errors.missingContext: Payment context is missing. Return to payment and try again.
errors.authRequiredDescription: Sign in to verify payment activation from your account.
